title: unable to connect to server lol loading screen
body:
Been getting this message on all games since last patch.
Until last 2 games, would reconnect on second attempt, now simple unable to join even after several attempts...

replies.body: If you were already having attempting to reconnect issues, then your connection might have been degrading to the point where it's cutting you off entirely now.  You'll want to run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up the health of your network.  This should get you back in, but test it in a custom!
